summary: A doctor and his family move to a quiet, small town. Soon he discovers the town's dark secret: A terrifying race of controlling creatures that live in the darkness in the forest behind their home.
cast: Dean Stockwell|Sean Patrick Thomas|Blanche Baker|Kristen Bush|Anthony Del Negro|Christina Costello|Steven A. Miller|Dina Cataldi|Yanina Hope|Cara Loften|Jerry Dwyer Jr.|Jacqui Denski|Azumi Tsutsui|Athena Grant|Jon Denski|Chris Dimoulas|Murphy Betancourt|Ron Komora|Joey Johnson|David Weindel|Bastian|Kathleen Huber|Marty Gargle|John Trent|Eva Marie Wasko|Kyle Durand
title: Deep in the Darkness
